```py
# create a Flask application that has a route to /
# which returns the text "Hello World."
```

```py
# create a Flask application that has a route to /
# which returns the text "Hello World."
from flask import Flask

app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route('/')
def hello_world():
    return 'Hello World

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run()
```
